member.summary: Extracts media samples from the payload of received RTP packets.

member.name: M:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Source.Rtsp.Reader.IRtpPayloadReader.OnReceivingFirstPacket(System.Int64,System.Int32)
member.param: The timestamp associated with the first received RTP packet. This number has no unit, the duration conveyed by it depends on the frequency of the media that the RTP packet is carrying.
The sequence associated with the first received RTP packet.
member.summary: This method should be called on reading the first packet in a stream of incoming packets.

member.param: The timestamp of the first packet to arrive after seek.
The server acknowledged seek time in microseconds.
member.summary: Seeks the reader.

member.summary: Parses an AC3 byte stream carried on RTP packets, and extracts AC3 frames.

member.name: T:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Source.Rtsp.Reader.RtpPcmReader
member.summary: Parses byte stream carried on RTP packets, and extracts PCM frames.

member.summary: Represents the header and the payload of an RTP packet.

member.summary: The RTP CSRC fields (Optional, up to 15 items).

member.summary: The RTP CSRC count field (Word 0, bits 4-7).

member.summary: The RTP extension bit (Word 0, bit 3).

member.summary: The RTP marker bit (Word 0, bit 8).

member.summary: The RTP padding bit (Word 0, bit 2).

member.name: P:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Source.Rtsp.RtpPacket.PayloadType
member.summary: The RTP CSRC count field (Word 0, bits 9-15).

member.name: P:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Source.Rtsp.RtpPacket.SequenceNumber
member.summary: The RTP sequence number field (Word 0, bits 16-31).

member.name: P:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Source.Rtsp.RtpPacket.Ssrc
member.summary: The RTP SSRC field (Word 2).

member.name: P:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Source.Rtsp.RtpPacket.Timestamp
member.summary: The RTP timestamp field (Word 1).

member.name: P:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Source.Rtsp.RtpPacket.Version
member.summary: The RTP version field (Word 0, bits 0-1), should always be 2.

member.summary: Returns the next sequence number of the sequenceNumber.

member.summary: Returns the previous sequence number from the sequenceNumber.

member.name: M:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Source.Rtsp.RtpPacket.Parse(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.param: The buffer that contains the RTP packet data.
The length of the RTP packet.
member.summary: Creates an RtpPacket from a byte array.

member.name: M:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Source.Rtsp.RtpPacket.WriteToBuffer(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.param: A target byte buffer to which the packet data is copied.
The offset into the target array at which to write.
The maximum number of bytes that can be written.
member.summary: Writes the data in an RTP packet to a target buffer.
member.returns: The number of bytes written, or C#LENGTH_UNSET if there is not enough space to write the packet.
